title: Chen Integrals, Generalized Loops and Loop Calculus
abstract: We use Chen iterated line integrals to construct a topological algebra ${\cal A}_p$ of separating functions on the {\it Group of Loops} ${\bf L}{\cal M}_p$. ${\cal A}_p$ has an Hopf algebra structure which allows the construction of a group structure on its spectrum. We call this topological group, the group of generalized loops $\widetilde {{\bf L}{\cal M}_p}$. Then we develope a {\it Loop Calculus}, based on the {\it Endpoint} and {\it Area Derivative Operators}, providing a rigorous mathematical treatment of early heuristic ideas of Gambini, Trias and also Mandelstam, Makeenko and Migdal. Finally we define a natural action of the "pointed" diffeomorphism group $Diff_p({\cal M})$ on $ \widetilde {{\bf L}{\cal M}_p}$, and consider a {\it Variational Derivative} which allows the construction of homotopy invariants. This formalism is useful to construct a mathematical theory of {\it Loop Representation} of Gauge Theories and Quantum Gravity. Figures available by request.
